name: Ho'omana'o Mau: My Somber Daydream
description:
❇️   Do you ever wish that you could talk to a loved one, again? To tell them you love them, that you miss them, and your regrets? ❇️

  #BitsyJam #rememberance

                                                           

Ho'omana'o Mau: A Somber Daydream was created in Adam Le Doux's Bitsy engine and includes a few very simple levels to test out what is possible with the Bitsy editor. 

Bitsy currently doesn't currently support audio.
